html.p: The Red Head Trail from the campground along the seacliffs to Red Head is closed until further notice due to unsafe conditions.

dl.dd: The park is located just 32 km (20 mi) east of Parrsboro and 57 km (35 mi) west of Truro, on Route 2, "The Glooscap Trail". Route 2 is linked to Highway 104 at Exit 4 in Amherst, Exit 5 near Springhill, and Exit 11 at Glenholme.

html.p: the park offers a 90-site campground two picnic areas,an unsupervised beach, playground and comfort station facility.
